# textBaseline Constants

**API Collection**

Constants used to set the `textBaseline` property that specify the vertical alignment of the bounding box relative to its y-coordinate. 

## Constants

- **top**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box with top of text glyphs.
- **hanging**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box just below the top of text glyphs.
- **middle**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box with the middle of text glyphs.
- **alphabetic**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box with the bottom of alphabetic text glyphs without descenders.
- **ideographic**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box with the bottom of ideographic text glyphs.
- **bottom**: Aligns the y-coordinate of the bounding box with the bottom of text glyphs with descenders.
